attributes.action: Remove tolls on both the new Mersey Gateway bridge &  Silver Jubilee Bridge
attributes.additional_details: This will be detrimental to the North West and Cheshire / Merseyside and this toll should be removed.
attributes.background:
Both the new Mersey Gateway bridge and the existing Silver Jubilee Bridge will be tolled when the new bridge opens this autumn.
The Silver Jubilee Bridge has never had a toll.
